Description:
A small magnetic sled which is used to accelerate a collection of tungsten grains to incredible velocities.  Sandshot is extremely effective against missiles and other unprotected targets, but completely useless against warships.

Type: Ballistic/Magnetic
Size: 15mm
Role: Defensive
Armor Penetration: 1 cm
Component Damage: 75 hp
Muzzle Velocity: 2500 m/s
Range: 8,000 m
Volume: 0.0025 mÂ³
